updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify IPS notification with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name for IPS traffic
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name

Change usernotification setting to client.

Go to IPS setting.

Change notification to custom block template which has all the variable.

Access malware site
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification for IPS traffic.

Make sure variable values are matching with the values in transaction events.

updated_cases.title: [Browser] Verify IPS notification with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name for IPS traffic
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create BLOCK notification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Go to IPS setting.

Change notification to custom block template which has all the variable.

Login to Box app.

Upload malicious file to Box app.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in browser notification for IPS traffic.

Make sure variable values are matching with the values in transaction events.

updated_cases.title: [Browser] Verify redirect URL with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name added in redirect URL.

Change usernotification setting to browser.

Create UJ policy with custom template for browse activity.

Access the URL.

Click on block option.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name (Real Time Policy), User, Instance ID, Object Name are present in redirected URL.

Make sure variable values are matching with the values in transaction events.

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: Source IP (Real Time Policy) and Destination IP (Real Time Policy)
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Source IP (Real Time Policy) and and Destination IP (Real Time Policy).

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload for Box application.

Perform Upload to Box application.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Source IP (Real Time Policy) is displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

Source IP should be machine IP from where client is connected.

If Source IP is not available, then it should display X-Forwarded-For IP or TCP connection IP.

Make sure variable values are matching with the values in transaction events.

Make sure templates are created with version 2.1 on nsproxy.

Source IP should be machine IP from where client is connected.

If Source IP is not available, then it should display X-Forwarded-For IP or TCP connection IP.

updated_cases.title: [Browser notification] Verify UserJustification template with new variables: POP and From User for browse activity
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: POP and From User

Change usernotification setting to Browser.

Create user alert policy for browse with cloud storage apps.

Perform Upload to Box application.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure POP and From User is displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in browser notification.

From_user value should be displayed as empty value as browse activity does not have from user value.

Make sure variable values are matching with the values in transaction events.
